abstract.text: A
subclass to show and edit an image.

inlineContent.text: The user can move edge and corner handlers to redefine the polygon manually and rotate the image in 90 degree steps (counter) clockwise.
This class cannot be instanced from a storyboard.
Instead it is installing itself as a child view controller onto a given parent view controller.
